Fixed: Extrude drawn path to a fixed height determined by the Extrude Height property
Interactive: Extrude drawn path to height set via additional mouse input after finishing the path
RampFixed: Extrude with increasing height along the drawn path. The height at the start and the end of the ramp is determined by the Extrude Height and Ramp Start Ratio properties .
RampInteractive: Extrude with increasing height along the drawn path. The height is set via additional mouse input after finishing the path.
